items.title: Flights halted at Kenyan airport as thousands turn out to receive Odinga's body
items.description: A sudden influx of mourners prompted authorities to relocate the public viewing ceremony.

items.title: Titan submersible imploded due to poor engineering, say US officials
items.description: The submersible disappeared from sensors on its journey to the wreck of the Titanic, killing all five people on board.

items.title: Watch: Police fire tear gas at protesters in Peru
items.description: Police fired tear gas at protesters who could be seen sheltering in doorways.

items.title: India's exports to US plunge as Trump's 50% tariffs bite
items.description: US has become India's most severely affected market since the tariff war began.

items.title: S Korea tycoon escapes paying $1bn in 'divorce of the century'
items.description: The high court has struck down an order for Chey Tae-won to pay a record divorce settlement to his ex-wife.
